body.p: The Wine development release 1.3.10 is now available.

What's new in this release:
Support for notification balloons in system tray.
Obsolete AudioIO sound driver removed.
More work on ActiveX support.
Various MSI fixes.
Preloader now used for 64-bit too.
Translation updates.
Various bug fixes.

p.p: The source is available now. Binary packages are in the process of being built, and will appear soon at their respective download locations.
